Html:
Kind of like a guestbook, but edited by the admin only.

How would you add a new template page that can be edited by the admin with current members? basically a template page with the Pencil edit option like the default page.

and add a proper link to the Master Page?

Example:

Kind of like your guys People page.
Take a look at the latest checkin. Then go to "~/content/YOURPAGE.aspx". This will create a new page for you.
